about_the_game:
Jump straight to Level 85 in EverQuest and experience they high level content in the latest Hero’s Forge armor!

This bundle contains:

  • Heroic Character
  • Hero’s Forge Armor Feature
detailed_description:
Jump straight to Level 85 in EverQuest and experience they high level content in the latest Hero’s Forge armor!

This bundle contains:

  • Heroic Character

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, or Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium® II 400 equivalent or greater
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA Ti 4800 or ATI 9800
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:10 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows XP, Windows Vista, or Windows 7
  • Processor:Pentium® 4 equivalent or greater
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA 6800 or ATI x1800
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:10 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible Sound Card
